mere.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: used to emphasize how small or unimportant something or someone is
mere.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: She lost the election by a mere 20 votes.
It can’t be a mere coincidence that they left at the same time.
mere.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: used to emphasize that something which is small or not extreme has a big effect or is important
mere.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: The merest little noise makes him nervous.
The mere thought of food made her feel sick.
The mere fact that the talks are continuing is a positive sign.
